item.title: How to Format Text in the Microsoft Sticky Notes App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Format Text: With Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Copy Text: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Cut Text: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Paste Text: With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut No time to scroll down? Click through these tutorial slides: Follow along with a tutorial video: How to Format Text With Click Method 1: First edit a sticky note and select any text.
